citations.narrative:
The inventory of dogs on hand (APHIS Form 7005 Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on Hand) was not current or
accurate. There were approximately 2 dogs no longer in the kennel that had not been documented as disposed of and
approximately 8 dogs currently in the kennel that were not listed.
Records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly disclose the number of animals held,
owned, and acquired or disposed of are necessary in order to accurately track animals being used in regulated activities
to ensure their humane care and use.
Licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of acquisition of dogs and cats that fully and correctly discloses the
required information.
Correct by: November 28, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The inventory of dogs on hand (APHIS Form 7005 Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on Hand) was not current or 
accurate. There were approximately 2 dogs no longer in the kennel that had not been documented as disposed of and 
approximately 8 dogs currently in the kennel that were not listed. 
Records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly disclose the number of animals held, 
owned, and acquired or disposed of are necessary in order to accurately track animals being used in regulated activities 
to ensure their humane care and use.  
Licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of acquisition of dogs and cats that fully and correctly discloses the 
required information. 
Correct by: November 28, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
